Title: Relates to the sharing of revenue from gaming devices located within the county of Niagara
Summary: Provides that $1,600,000 of any funds from gaming devices located within the county of Niagara shall be transferred to the Niagara county industrial development agency for use to fund downtown economic development initiatives within the city of Niagara Falls.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-h, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the sharing of revenue from gaming devices located within the county of Niagara
